name: TaxAct 2021 1040 Tax Return Backup
summary: A BA1 file is a backup of a U.S. tax return created with TaxAct 2021. It contains a user's 2021 personal and income tax information, for use on tax form 1040. BA1 files are used to archive a user's tax return for future reference and to back up the user's return in case their .TA1 file goes missing or becomes corrupt.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
